training sword.description: A light, flimsy sword, barely capable of doing much more damage than your bare hands.

training bow.description: A light, wooden bow frame, connected by a thin piece of sinew. You ponder if it would be more effective to just throw arrows.

training staff.description: A branch cut from a tree that barely passes for a staff.

training plate.description: Two rough wooden slabs, connected by flimsy straps. Might stop an arrow or two!

training bodice.description: A thin piece of leather hung around the neck.

training robes.description: A thin blue robe. At least it's breezy!

silly string.description: Shoot it at people to annoy them!

beginner's ticket.description: A thin paper ticket. It reads "Exchange me for freedom!"

silver key.description: This looks like it would unlock a nearby chest!
